name: itay-upsell-and-cart-plugin
description: A plugin that gives the store owner a feature to output a new products slider at the product page to increase sales. Also implements a dynamic cart.

scripts.start: wp-scripts start src/admin/css/adminstyles.scss src/user/css/userstyles.scss src/user/js/slider.js src/admin/js/dashboard.js src/admin/js/upsell-manager.js src/admin/js/cart-manager.js src/user/js/cart.js

author: Itay Andre Aknin
